title: Companion Approval Guide
content: Dribbles the Clown asks you to come on stage choose Jaheira instead and ask him to enter the stage a second time by saying "All hail the High Harper". Requirement/s: Ask Jaheira to go on stage Halsin + Jaheira - Dribbles the Clown Circus of the Last Days - You can find Dribbles the Clown performing on stage for a crowd on the northern side of the Circus. When Dribbles the Clown asks you to come on stage choose Jaheira instead and ask him to enter the stage a second time by saying "Get on with it
